subject: Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal pulled out of the season-ending Masters Cup in Shanghai, citing fatigue after a long season and the need to prepare for the Davis Cup final. Nadal, the world’s top-ranked player, made the announcement on his Web site, describing his withdrawal as “one of the most difficult decisions in my career.”.
